Package com.crs.dao

Class ICarLeaseRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.crs.dao.ICarLeaseRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICarLeaseRepository
public class ICarLeaseRepositoryImpl extends Object implements ICarLeaseRepository
Implementation of the ICarLeaseRepository interface for managing car leasing operations.
